name: quality-gate
description: Comprehensive quality validation for TypeScript/JavaScript projects: runs TypeScript checks, tests, coverage analysis, build validation, and linting. Returns structured results for conductor workflow integration. Works with standard tooling (npm, tsc, Vitest/Jest).

project_path.description: Path to project directory (TypeScript/JavaScript project with package.json)

returns.description: Quality gate results with pass/fail status and detailed check results

examples.description: Run quality gate on TypeScript/JavaScript project with 80% coverage threshold
